caption.p: Microbial communities in the gut of experimental hens collected after 5 weeks of black soldier fly (BSF) larvae and pre-pupae dietary supplementation (C: n = 9; L: n = 10; P: n = 10). Unweighted UniFrac distance principal coordinate analysis (PCoA) plots of Î²-diversity measurement of the microbiota communities. C: control diet; L: larvae diet; P: pre-pupae diet.
